content:
Feldstein family

1 Jozef FELDSTEIN
 + Gitli                             (Moyzes)
  2x Abraham FELDSTEIN               1797 - May 27, 1876 #181
    + Malie /Malka KATZ              1796-97 (Leibel)
     3x Jozef Leibel FELDSTEIN       1820 #80 - Sep 1, 1887 #349
       + Chaia Perla WEBER           1819-20 - Dec 16, 1875 #351
             married Jun 21, 1843 #33

          * Samuel FIALA             Aug 13, 1839 #373
                married Jun 24, 1875 #36

        4x Simche FELDSTEIN          Jul 19, 1846 #326 - 1852 #124

        4o Ester FELDSTEIN           Jul 4, 1854 #303

    ?? + Sara Fradel REGENT          1828-29

       * Jakob Hirsch RAPP
